sentences.sentence: The value of Britain increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease greatly by 2012; while India and America increase between 2010 and 2012.

sentences.sentence: The value of Britain increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease greatly by 2012; while India and America increase between 2010 and 2012.
